title: UCP Capability
description: Schema for UCP capabilities and extensions. Extensions are capabilities with an 'extends' field. Uses reverse-domain naming for governance.

extends.description: Parent capability this extends. Present for extensions, absent for root capabilities.

platform_schema.title: Capability (Platform Schema)
platform_schema.description: Full capability declaration for platform-level discovery. Includes spec/schema URLs for agent fetching.

business_schema.title: Capability (Business Schema)
business_schema.description: Capability configuration for business/merchant level. May include business-specific config overrides.

response_schema.title: Capability (Response Schema)
response_schema.description: Capability reference in responses. Only name/version required to confirm active capabilities.
